Class UserInput

java.lang.Object
UserInput
public class UserInput extends Object
Error handling for unexpected user inputs.

      public static int nextInt​(String inMsg)

      Returns:
      valid input entered

    • nextInt

      public static int nextInt​(String inMsg, int lLimit, int uLimit)
      Gets an integer within a range of numbers from user. Shows relevant error message when input entered is not an integer or not within the range.
      Parameters:
      inMsg - Error message or prompt displayed
      lLimit - Lower limit of accepted value, inclusive
      uLimit - Upper limit of accepted value, inclusive
      Returns:
      valid input entered

    • getGender

      public static char getGender​(String inMsg)

      Returns:

    • getContact

      public static int getContact​(String inMsg)
      Gets a contact number from user. Shows relevant error message input is not an integer or the integer is not 8 digit long.
      Parameters:
      inMsg - Error message or prompt displayed
      Returns:
      valid 8 digit long integer input entered

    • getDateTime

      public static Calendar getDateTime​(String inMsg)
      Gets a date and time input from user. Shows relevant error message when input entered is not in dd/mm/yy hh:mm format.
      Parameters:
      inMsg - Error message or prompt displayed
      Returns:
      valid date and time input entered

    • getDateForReport

      public static Calendar getDateForReport​(String inMsg)
      Gets date from user for generating 1‐day report. Shows relevant error message when input entered is not in dd/mm/yyyy format.
      Parameters:
      inMsg - Error message or prompt displayed
      Returns:
      valid date input entered
